answers.answer: I falied both my 1 and 3 hour test :(  both times my glucose levels were high. So I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes. Are u scheduled for the 3 hour one?
Yes I have to go back in the am& retest for three hours...I'm nervous, how high were your levels if u don't mind me asking& did u have to change your diet?
At how many weeks do they have you take that test?
Okay so not looking forward to that.

My doctor didn't tell me she just said that both times they came out high. And yes after the diagnoses they set up an appointment with a specialists who goes over a diet plan for you. I check my sugar levels 4x a day now it's really not that bad though honestly,  once you start understanding it and learning to eat better it's a piece of cake. Don't worry too much about it you'll be fine
Thanx...I guess I just can't helpbut to be nervous
Well managed gd pregnancy is not high risk at all :) I've got it too plus on meds

My doctor didn't tell me she just said that both times they came out high. And yes after the diagnoses they set up an appointment with a specialists who goes over a diet plan for you. I check my sugar levels 4x a day now it's really not that bad though honestly,  once you start understanding it and learning to eat better it's a piece of cake. Don't worry too much about it you'll be fine
Sorry didn't mean to post it twice

question: Did any get their blood sugar tested & received high level results the first time? Mine was 165 without eating anything only drinking the liquid they test u with& I'm 28 weeks
title: Glucose levels
